website_summaries.verdict: Good price point for a fireproof and waterproof bag that can protect legal size documents.
pros: Uses a double layer of material in the bag to deliver extra protection
With dimensions of 11" x 15", this protective bag can accommodate many items, including jewelry or a laptop
Uses a silicone coating over the fiberglass material, so it's comfortable to touch without gloves
cons: Only rated to be heatproof for up to 1,000°F, lagging behind others

customer_reviews.title: Very cool.. Multiple purpose
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great for quad copters. Throw props in this bag, lipos etc, and it has a few more uses.. Check it out! And it is fire resistant!
customer_reviews.author: JJRotoGeek

customer_reviews.title: This bag will save your bacon!
customer_reviews.text: This bag could save you a lot of grief and trouble if you load it up with your passports, titles, birth certificates, cash, hard drives, and anything else worth saving. The bag is very well made, with smooth material and precise stitching, and the velcro fastener is wide and strong. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stumpy

customer_reviews.title: Good size and seems like a good product
customer_reviews.text: Good size and seems like a good product! I hope I never have to test how fireproof it is but the build quality gives me some confidence.
customer_reviews.author: F. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The build quality of the product is very good. your passports
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical before buying this bag but as i opened the package my apprehensions were gone.it is bigger than as it looks in the pictures. The build quality of the product is very good.your passports ,jewlery, important documents,hard discs ,DVDs and other stuff can easily be accommodated inside it. I tried exposing this bag to the lighter flame and there was no effect on the bag. It is big enough to have some certificates like birth or marriage. Moreover to my joy I can use it to keep my lipo batteries of my drones.its a kinda added advantage with this bag. So overall I would recommend to buy this bag at this price.you can blindly go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav Katiyar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: velcro is tough to open.. but makes me feel safe in case of fire
customer_reviews.author: anativitateml

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy !
customer_reviews.text: My bank no longer has a Safety Deposit Box, so this for now...
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Well, I certainly haven't tested these yet but they ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, I certainly haven't tested these yet but they hold my important documents freeing up space in my fireproof "safe."
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly in my safe. Holds alot
customer_reviews.text: Also the size is perfect. It fit snug against the wall of my safe like it was made for it. Sure my safe is fireproof but it contains some savings. Social security cards. Birth certificate Tax info etc. Point is why not add this last line of defense.
customer_reviews.author: XXIII_FIN_IIIXX

customer_reviews.title: This is very good bag, my husband and I just love it
customer_reviews.text: Wow ! This is very good bag , my husband and I just love it . Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Tyler L.

customer_reviews.title: Will not survive a real fire.
customer_reviews.text: This will not survive, even a bit, in a real house fire. We lost ours in the recent fires in Butte County. The bag was in shreds and turned to powder upon touch. Well made, and would likely help if it were inside a safe too. Our bag was not in a safe, so we didn’t have much hope. Do not depend on this bag for fire protection - buy a safe and layer your important documents or money in several protective bags/cases.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa reimer

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality security
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it’s another high quality product from Colcase! The materials are of excellent quality, the seams are very well sealed, even the hook-and-loop is very good! It’s perfect for keeping valued documents safe at home, and I plan to use one for my valuables on my upcoming trip to Europe for extra peace of mind. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: M. Matches

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I bought this the house across from mine caught fire. Like it literally went up in flames. Idk but I saw that as a bad sign lol. Anyways, I’m not sure if it’s fireproof but I know it’s sturdy! This material is thick and it’s waterproof. The Velcro is so loud though so don’t open it when someone is sleeping. And when I mean someone I need a baby or a toddler because dear God you will regret it. But I do love this folder because it is secure, it is sturdy, it doesn’t feel cheap and it is waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and effective
customer_reviews.text: I had some time with the bag including trying to burn a hole through it with a butane torch. The bag survived just fine although it does have a nasty spot on it now, note it did not go through and the inside only shows some discoloration. The inside looks like fiberglass I also found an interesting use for see my photos.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Heat resisted, But not fire proof.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the purpose of having an extra layer of protection for my important documents and cash that I keep in my Fireproof gun safe. It does seem like it would be heat resisted to non-open flames for a long period of time. but after watching some videos on the product after I purchased it, I see it won't hold up for very up for direct flames such as a campfire for more than a few mins. because the seems melt which then allows the fire to get inside.
customer_reviews.author: Zero Tolerance

customer_reviews.title: Non-itch is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: It caused a horrible itch up to my elbow from putting documents inside the bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: whenever you have a fire, you have a flood
customer_reviews.text: Firemen say that whenever you have a fire, you have a flood. This protects against both. So if you keep any important documents at home (car titles, passports, birth certificates, marriage certificates, etc.) you need one of these. The sock drawer just doesn't offer enough protection. So take your documents out of the sock drawer, put them in this document bag, and then return this to the sock drawer. Your future self will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Atlanta Jack

customer_reviews.title: Almost the best
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is strong and impressive. It has a sturdy velcro flap that leaves two "holes" at the bend in the fold where smoke/water could get in. It's large enough for full-sized documents and the silver surface is rubbery and beads water. This is better than most, but the lack of a zipper gives it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable quality protective case
customer_reviews.text: As an overwrap for important papers, passports, etc., this appears to be of good quality. I think it might protect against extreme heat, but I am not too sure about a Velcro closure being a good waterproof seal. Overall, this is acceptable for attempting to protect documents. (We purchased two of them)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind when you need it. Better to have and not need than to need and not have
customer_reviews.text: Can’t speak to how fireproof or waterproof it is since it hasn’t been through a fire yet, but I use it as a means to ensure critical documents stay safe in my fireproof safe (avoid moisture from water putting out a fire causing steam to damage), it’s a backup security for all things critical. It’s also a perfect quick-grab bag of all crucial items you would need in an emergency. I have two since they don’t store too many documents, but it works so it can fit in any safe, or in my emergency kit if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Launa Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do what it says on the label
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy pouch that closes with velcro and will hold maybe 3/4" of stacked papers/passports/etc. Without setting fire to it I can't actually vouch for its fireproof-ness, but it's a good way to keep in one place all the docs you'd need to "bug out" in case of emergency. I will probably buy another for sentimental, irreplaceable things like baby books.
customer_reviews.author: CNL

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: If you can't afford a safe, or, like me, don't really have room for a decent sized one in your home or apartment, this is a fantastic alternative. Lightweight, easy to spot in a stack of papers if you need to hurry out the door, and spacey. Plenty of room for vital documents for two people. If you are storing documents for more than two people, or just lead an exceedingly complicated life, consider buying two of these bad boys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected, thick material, no odor
customer_reviews.text: This was much bigger than I expected it to be, ill post a picture for comparison. I havent tested it for being fire or water proof but the material doesn't make me question it for fire at least. Water, im unsure of. The top is closed by a thick strip of velcro so im not sure if it was submerged for long periods if it would stay fully dry on the inside. There's no odor, which is great and since its bigger than I expected ill be able to add more to it.
customer_reviews.author: JennBerry

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Have not experience a fire with it so I can't say my 5 star rating means a whole lot, but... I put my documents in a regular folder first and then slid the folder into the document bag with no problem. I recommend using a folder since it will be easier to get your paper in and out of the bag. The bag itself feels sturdy and of good quality. The velcro is very strong. I like that it's very portable so I can just grab it and throw it in a bag if there is a real emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The bag was much larger than I expected, which is a good thing. You can store documents without folding them in half. All the seams are edged so you don't get the "itchies" from stray fiberglass getting on your forearm. The velcro is super size so it really keeps the bag closed securely. Although it's not a completely waterproof bag I'm sure it will keep things dry in light rain, etc. The quality is everywhere in this bag. I use mine to store lipo batteries for my R/C airplanes and during charging so in case there's a mishap the bag should help in containing the fire. You won't reget it.
customer_reviews.author: Kingmeow

customer_reviews.title: There is no way of knowing if this product meets its claims....
customer_reviews.text: ..... I am just hoping it does. Bought one for myself and another for a family member. Can't rate due to no fire. I am grateful for that! But, the bag seems nice. Well packaged. Size is adequate. Appears to be insulated well. No obnoxious smell. Let's just hope seller is honest about it's descriptions and the claims they have made in the product description. I can only give 3 stars since the product has not been put to the test.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: It's a quite large bag that has the ability to ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a quite large bag that has the ability to hold a lot of items your trying to protect. I will be using the bag for my lipo batteries when going overseas on the plane. When not traveling I'll be keeping various documents in the bag in my safe which is also fireproof. I can't say for sure if the bag is indeed fireproof because I'm not willing to test it out for obvious reasons. It's a very tough well mad bag that I have no doubt will hold true to it's claim of being fireproof and I hope I never have to find out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Seems heavy duty, holds all my important papers
customer_reviews.text: A great addition for double-securing the important documents in your fireproof safe, (if you're like me). It helps keep them out of the way of other stuff in my safe, like laptops and guns, jewelry box, etc. I haven't set it on fire to test it, but it seems very durable, strong Velcro and it fits all our passports, birth certs, titles, med records, you'll find things to keep in it if you get one. And yes, you should get one.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a grab & go bag!
customer_reviews.text: Recently friends of ours lost their home in a fire and I realized that we needed to get something to keep our important papers safe. This COLCASE document bag is perfect to keep in a grab and go bag, and even to keep within our safe that we can grab and run with if we had more of a warning.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Summerlin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bag for Valuables
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, just as described. I am very sensitive to odors and was a bit worried after reading some of the reviews saying the bag smelled, but am happy to report there is absolutely no odor at all. The only problem from my perspective is that the velcro is seriously strong, it is difficult to open for someone with arthritis. Very pleased and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sister Renee Pittelli

customer_reviews.title: Always good to have a backup and safely secured
customer_reviews.text: Always have planned for the unexpected, but took the extra security of having them in a fire resistant case. Have thought a few times about throwing the case on a bbq grill to see how fire resistant, but will have to wait for now. I think it could protect the documents from fire for a while till it breaks down.
customer_reviews.author: Commdrdave

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I haven't set fire to it, but this document bag seems what I hoped for. It is somewhat pliable and bends because it is a bag. I put a piece of cardboard in it to prevent documents from creasing. Still, the document bag appears to be fairly sturdy. Could be that the piece of cardboard I put in there is unnecessary. I can't speak to water or fire resistance. Hoping I never need to.
customer_reviews.author: Roo

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and fire resistant just like it says on the tin
customer_reviews.text: I took this straight out of the plastic and put a burning match to it. It left a tiny brown stain from the soot but, the material wasn't compromised at all. Really amazing material. This is large enough to put an envelope full of documents inside and something like an external drive of some sort. I am considering buying a few more to give away as gifts to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: W.S.

customer_reviews.title: Fake, not a fireproof
customer_reviews.text: It's not a fireproof, just tried with the cigarette lighter and the case started melting.
customer_reviews.author: Karthik

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for Extra Protection
customer_reviews.text: Excellent additional protection for my critical documents. I still will store these COLCASE bags in a fireproof safe, as that will give some additional insulation for high heat in the event of a fire. The bags will certainly withstand fire, but the internal temperate will still soar very high, thus baking the contents on the inside. The bags are plenty big for many documents or larger objects, also they are easily folded to conserve space if needed in a small safe.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: One can only hope....
customer_reviews.text: In order to know how fire or water resistant it is, one must put it in a fire or submerge in water. I watched a YouTube video or two about these envelope style bags and its a mixed review thing. Im counting on it to work better than having my valuables in a safe alone unprotected vs this pouch as added protection. One can only hope.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice pouch. Exactly what I was looking for to hold important papers
customer_reviews.author: Brenda P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: This bag is nice to store my important documents such as my passport and birth certificate. It's a thick and sturdy material with a Velcro closure. I have not tested this out with fire as I've seen other reviewers take the liberty of checking it out and believe their videos. Overall, nice quality, no bad or strange smells. Comes wrapped in plastic and folded.
customer_reviews.author: Rae di Tavolo

customer_reviews.title: Quality feel, thick and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, Thick, Strong, Easy to Grip. If I had to trust something to keep fire away from important documents, I'd choose this. The bag is bigger than I thought, perfect size for documents. The rubberized (silicone) grip on the outside gives it a quality feel. However, if you're into RC hobbies and need something to keep fire IN. This is a much stronger and reliable storage bag than some of those generic LiPo bags I've tried in the past. It holds 12 packs (1500mah) neatly, or you could put more in if you really wanted to cram it in.
customer_reviews.author: Damian E.

customer_reviews.title: Misled
customer_reviews.text: This don’t seal completely so I would say it’s not waterproof nor fire proof although I don’t want to try it, so I can’t honestly say if it would burn or not due to it not completely sealed in the corners
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use it as a secondary layer of fire protection for my Trust documents, which are stored in my home safe. It appears to be well made, and my documents fit perfectly. I also like the robust closure tab, which does a good job of enclosing the contents.
customer_reviews.author: T. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to Safety Deposit Box
customer_reviews.text: Without a Safe Deposit Box we had no place to securely store our important doc's. Items like Passport, Birth Certificate, Tax returns , etc were not even together in the same place. The COLCASE bag seemed like the answer and gave us a roomy fireproof place to store them all for less money than a safe deposit box. The inside has a nice coating so the documents slide easily in and roomy enough for 1 /12 inch or more stack of papers. The super strong Velcro enclosure make it very secure, nothing falling out of this bag. This helped to take some of the worry out of having a Wood Burning Stove in our house & keeping valuables safe.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: This was just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The folder is perfect for storing and protecting the house abstract, deed, schedule of payments, etc. If I need to get it out of the house in a hurry because of a fire or whatever, everything is in one easily-carried folder. I am delighted with the quality as well and hope I never have to test its water or fire resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur David Digby

customer_reviews.title: Great Safe Bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to store inside my safe to keep important documents such as my passport safe in case of fire or flood. This is a really nice high quality bag. It fits documents perfectly and has lots of room for other valuables such as checks, cash, etc. as well. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Sixtus

customer_reviews.title: safe fireproof document bag
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping, solid construction fireproof bag. For those who have lipo batteries, this is a must. Like all items that are extremely flammable it is highly recommended to ALWAYS keep watch during charging (do not leave unattended), fire extinguisher or sand bucket. The bag is NOT water resistant or water proof. I have not put this bag to the tes. The bag seems ideal to hold the spread of a fire if a lipo battery catches on fire and gives you time to combat the fire.
customer_reviews.author: LM Productions Inc.

customer_reviews.title: A very good LiPo bag for the largest things you can think of to put in it.
customer_reviews.text: Very quick shipping. I have several of these sort of bags for RC LiPo charging. This is the biggest one by far and the construction seems to be robust with good seams and generous Velco so you can put thicker things in it without it bulging out. Material used is flexible and folds easily. It does the job as well or better than any other fire bag on the market and because of the size, it takes care of everything could can put in it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Look else where
customer_reviews.text: Description is wrong. The measurements are with the flap open, which then makes it worthless for protecting your items.
customer_reviews.author: phillip hegedus

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great
customer_reviews.text: Think I might need to buy more of these. I have it in my room and put important documents inside. It doesn’t hold too much stuff which is why I might end up buying more. I haven’t had to test it in a fire or anything (Thank God) but I just wanted to be prepared
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my important documents. My birth certificate, social security card, life insurance policies etc. Things that would require time, effort and long distance travel to replace. I feel better knowing that my documents are protected.
customer_reviews.author: D. E.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the peace of mind this gives me until i read the other reviews about it not lasting in a fire and them pointing to youtube videos. still glad i have it vs not having it. but going to try to add it inside another fireproof container.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. I specifically bought this because I wanted to keep important paperwork safe from fire or water related issues. They are big so it doesn't fit into my filing cabinet but it is easy enough to slide ridge under it.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Better sewing, great size, nice rubbery feel.
customer_reviews.text: I'm kind of a fireproof bag power user because I constantly store and transport lithium polymer batteries, some of which are abused pretty regularly. Three things set this bag apart form other I have or have had. 1) Nice rubbery coating especially the flap. Easy to grab, seems like it will wear better than some. 2) Edges are sewn all the way up to the top. Every other FP bag I have handled is only sewn about as far as the velcro. That allows small parts and wire ends to get out. 3) Size! The pics I uploaded show it holding 9, 4S, 1300 racing batteries. It could carry 20.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely impressed by the quality of this bag. I have other fireproof bags that are similar but the quality of this is much better in every way. I mostly use this to transport lithium polymer batteries and can easily store about 20+ small/medium sized batteries in this bag. The velcro works really well and I don't have to worry about my batteries falling out. I have a 13inch laptop that also fits easily in the bag as well as an ipad along with a bunch of documents.
customer_reviews.author: Hardik P.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: I originally got this for Lipo Batteries, but am using it to keep important documents that I store in a small safe. It is not a super high end safe and always had it in the back of my mind what would happen if a fire struck. This pouch is much thicker than my Lipo bags and is large enough to handle quite a few items. The Velcro strap is pretty substantive too. It is almost large enough to hold my 17" laptop.
customer_reviews.author: A&K

customer_reviews.title: Built great
customer_reviews.text: Fits my important papers without the heavy weight of a safe
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Beaudry

customer_reviews.title: I loved it
customer_reviews.text: I loved it 🥰🥰 I got one for myself but will be given it to my mom Instead since she wanted one n I bought another one for me. I’m giving this review in just one day but I feel confident enough about the way it looks n feels so 🤍❤️ 2 for us please
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Robust construction, nicely packaged fire resistant pouch with hook & loop closure
customer_reviews.text: Great product - exactly as described. Item was delivered very quickly and was packaged very well. Product looks very well made and I hope it will protect our documents from heat and fire! I don't think I will personally test the capability of the document bag though...
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: Cant really rate it w/o setting it on fire.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go in my safe as an extra layer of protection for documents. Cant really rate it as far as fireproof bc I'm not about to set it on fire just to test it(if for some reason it is in a fire I will come back and edit this review)but as far as construction goes it seems legit. has a good amount of mass to it so it should protect something
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt durt

customer_reviews.title: Colcase Fireproof Document Bag
customer_reviews.text: Although I have metal lock boxes, I am taking extra steps to protect important documents and have placed these inside of this heavy duty fire resistant bag inside of the locked boxes. I highly recommend them and they do come in different sizes which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Durable bag for keeping your documents safe.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to put my important documents in that will keep it safe. Came across this bag and it's big enough for what I want put in it. The material is very tough and durable so I know it won't break apart in the coming years. Being fireproof is also a big plus, since fire can be a problem where I live. In case of an emergency I know I can just grab this bag and have all my documents with me.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: larger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that it arrived fast and was larger than I expected, so I was able to fit a few more important documents in it. I was surprised by the Velcro closure, but I trust there is some method to that madness.... I cannot attest to it's effectiveness in fire prevention because I haven't tested it and I hope I never have to!
customer_reviews.author: Carita R.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Convenient size for travel to protect small number of items. Would put in large tote or suitcase. Have had for too short a time to rate it's durability, etc. Have been fortunate enough to be unable to rate for fire or water proof effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne Cortese

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be great
customer_reviews.text: Haven't run any tests but the bag feels substantial and is easy to get into and out of. Have our important papers in it and hope never to need to find out if it can actually survive a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Don Steward

customer_reviews.title: Fireproof & Doesn't draw Moisture...
customer_reviews.text: This fireproof bag is exactly what I was looking for. I had a fireproof security box, but it drew moister somehow. I'm very pleased to have this bag to secure all my important documents such as certificates, passports, titles, etc... all in my safe. It's also much better to keep in safe rather than the bulkier security box I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Cayla Mounce

customer_reviews.title: Great to have in any home.
customer_reviews.text: I have a safe in my home but sometimes we bring stuff out of it or get new things that don’t go into it right away. So I use this bag to store it all until I get a chance. Very thick bag and has a sturdy closure.
customer_reviews.author: seaturtles38

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Insurance for Important Papers
customer_reviews.text: A fireproof document bag is something that you might not have immediatel realized that would be extremely important in the household. Particularly in homes which do not have or cannot afford a fireproof safe, a document protecting bag such as this could be cheap insurance in an emergency. It has ample room inside for your passports, titles, tax documents, and more--up to about 3 inches in depth, depending on the LxW of the paper.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Fireproof safe bag
customer_reviews.text: Great fireproof bag. Fits all my essential items that need to be kept fireproof. This bag may be waterproof. But the Velcro flap doesn’t seem like it’s water right. If that’s why you’re buying this bag continue searching. However, I believe the sturdiness of this bag will hold up to a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Britain

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty bag!
customer_reviews.text: Got a big stack of casino winnings in the bag...let's hope it works... though, hope I never get to find out, lol. Heavy duty bag...sturdy, large and tough. The velcro straps stick super well! Good buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Envelope feels like it is of high quality, keep all of my important documents in and in my safe. Hopefully I never have to update my review because of a fire, but I do feel like they have a better chance of surviving and they are all organized in one easy to grab and go.
customer_reviews.author: M De

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel. Very thick
customer_reviews.text: High quality bag. Very well made. Much larger than expected. About the size of a legal notepad. Nice feel. Very thick. I have other lipo bags. One cheap..one not so cheap both purchased from china manufacturers.. and this bag is hands down.. better than both those bags. Whether storing precious documents, or lipo batteries.. this bag is worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DEANNA JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: but it better then nothing to keep your important papers in
customer_reviews.text: As others have said the bag says Fire Resistant, not fireproof. It fells and appears to be made of the same material as my other Lipo bags. However, this one is much larger and gives me the options of putting paper work in it or even larger Lipo cells. I hope I never have to find out how fire resistant is its, but it better then nothing to keep your important papers in.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Topp

customer_reviews.title: i love the fact that the fiberglass is silicon coated and ...
customer_reviews.text: The fireproof bag seems very well made, i love the fact that the fiberglass is silicon coated and gives it a somewhat rubbery feel. I use it to store and transport lipo batteries at the moment and the velcro flap looks like it will hold up for a long time after repeated use. I also tested its fire proof ability using a propane tortch, the only damage was some discolored coating and that was it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Witt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have just completed filing my wills and other final documents in this easy to open folder. Its very large. I didn't expect it would hold as many documents as it has.. I love the fact it is fireproof as well. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Gibby's

customer_reviews.title: Pretty roomie.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for important papers to put in my safe as an added precaution. All my titles and other documents fit nicely and I could fold the excess material and fit it in my safe. Hope I never have to find out if it works!
customer_reviews.author: Casey F. LaCasse

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. It will not so much to protect against water damage because the top only seals with a velcro flap. Overall, the quality is good and it should fill my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Good fire resistance and water resistance. Only thing that burns are the straps/sticky things that closes the bag. The bag does get very hot, so do be careful. I bought a couple more and some silica gel beads to absorb moisture. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ANN

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Floppier than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Much floppier than I anticipated, but easily remedied with some cardboard or other stiff material cut to size. For my purposes, I'd have liked it to be stiffer, but it seems well constructed, and it's great to have a single place to keep important documents (even if I'm not keeping this inside a safe).
customer_reviews.author: B F

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This works well and stores everything I needed it too- it even stores extra large documents, such as paperwork that went with our mortgage. It fits a lot of things and feels much bigger on the inside. Can't speak to whether or not the bag is fireproof- hopefully I will never have to find out.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Good envelope for few docs or small items
customer_reviews.text: Material seems to be sturdy, will be able to hold some us letter docs or smaller items like passports. Don't expect to fit a lot though, or the container won't close.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel I

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative for safekeeping
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something in lieu of a safe for our less important documents .. this is a great option and can be easily filed away in a cabinet too! Over sized to hold big papers!
customer_reviews.author: Azrawr

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Weight!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fireproof bag. I have my passport, vehicle titles, deed etc.. in the bag locked in my safe. Redundant? Yes, but it's peace of mind as well. Only problem is it doesn't expand much allowing you to store large amounts. Not a problem though, just ordered 2 more. As far as charging your batteries in the bag, by all means this thing is heavy duty. Still need to heed caution and watch when charging never leave your batteries unattended.
customer_reviews.author: Skyjammer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: This bag is extremely sturdy and very well made. The Velcro is strong and sticks well. I haven’t had a fire to actually know, but it definitely gives me a piece of mind that it will protect what I put in there.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Moore

customer_reviews.title: High quality, durable bag. Great size.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son who just bought a house. Great for those important papers that are hard to replace. High quality durable bag. Hopefully they never have to test the fireproof quality. This could easily be attached (Velcro etc) to a door or wall for quick access in an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn T

customer_reviews.title: Velcro separated - not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had a fire so I don't know how fireproof this actually is, but after might use for some documents and petty cash, the velcro separated from the flap - really poor stitching. I wouldn't recommend this anymore.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant.
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, I bought this because it's fire retardant. But just for the heck of it, I put some plain paper inside of it, closed it and held it under the kitchen faucet for about 30 seconds. When I opened it, the edges of all the papers inside it were quite wet.
customer_reviews.author: Montag144

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a well made product. Little confusing tho cause it has fireproof on it in large letters but also says fire resistant. So which is it? Hope fireproof.
customer_reviews.author: kgot420

customer_reviews.title: A must have for important documents
customer_reviews.text: I was shopping for a home safe and found out that they are not fire proof so I bought this bag to put our important documents in our safe. Luckily no fires yet but I do have piece of mind that we wouldn't loose our important documents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size, seems durable
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far...but I haven't burned my house down yet to test it.
customer_reviews.author: Sara K

customer_reviews.title: Can hold all important documents
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I first order it, but I was nicely surprised when it arrived with how much important staff I can fit in. I like how good it is made, material is steady and durable. It's good quality and amazing value for money. Would recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Dejana

customer_reviews.title: Quality bag
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product I was surprised as to how thick the bag is, it feels like a really good quality material. The size of the bag is also a good size I’d say it would fit Multiple 8 by 10 papers in it
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an inner-state move, to keep all important documents together and safe! Great product! Simplified SO many things!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Foldable to fit in safe
customer_reviews.text: It was as described and seals shut well. I haven't tested the fire proof Ness yet, but it was water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Barb Spike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality well made fireproof protection
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality fireproof document bag, great value. The stitching is excellent and very strong. A picture is included showing the front of the bag as received, and a couple of close ups of the stitching. I was surprised by the quality. It is large enough to easily hold 8 1/2" x 11" documents so you can protect all your important papers. These would make great gifts and I plan to buy them for each of my family during the year. The velcro closure is strong and grips well, you don't need to worry about it falling open. All in all for the price, it's a great buy and will last many years.
customer_reviews.author: KenE

customer_reviews.title: No way to test it - but it seems very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I keep my documents in a safe in this document bag. I hope it works and then I hope I never have it tested.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor guy

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and functional
customer_reviews.text: Nice document holder. Fits legal documents easily, can be folded when used for CDs or cash. Fits nicely in safe or bag. The Velcro closure holds firmly and is adhered well to the vinyl holder. I use this to carry and contain health care proxy and power of attorney papers for my elderly mother, keeping it in my emergency overnight bag for easy access. I bought 3 more to give to my adult children and they love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kathaleen I

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: It seems very well made. Does it protect it contents as claimed? I hope I never really find out but it sure looks well made
customer_reviews.author: Rdc300

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive document case.
customer_reviews.text: Sensitive document case. It looks nice & sturdy. Just hoping it lives up to its expectations, if needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fireproof bag for documents and lipo batteries alike! Check out the review video A+
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding fireproof bag for transporting, storing and charging lipo batteries. Very sturdy construction, able to handle larger lipo batteries without straining the threads. Have been using for several weeks and it is very impressive, especially for the cost. Check out my review video.
customer_reviews.author: VKGT

customer_reviews.title: just some piece of mind for stuff like Birth certificates and passports and such
customer_reviews.text: Just got this Fireproof bag to store my important stuff in to protect it from disaster, just some piece of mind for stuff like Birth certificates and passports and such. very impressed by the quality and weight of fabric. hope it never comes into play, good job Colcase
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect product. We have some religious documents like baptism that needed protection from water and fire but don’t need to clutter up a safe. Perfect option
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Flandreau

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction. Gives confidence that in event of fire that it will do its job. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Todd M. Morton

product_meta.title: COLCASE Fireproof Document Bag 15 x 11 Inches Non-Itchy Silicone Coated Fire Resistant Bag Fireproof Safe Storage for Money, Documents, Jewelry and Passport
feature_bullets: NON-ITCHY SILICONE COATED FIBERGLASS - Featured with super high quality silicone coated fireproof fiberglass , no glass fiber will annoy any more .
DOUBLE LAYERS PROTECTION - Both 2 layers are made of supreme fire retardant fiberglass material . 100% fire proof ! Stands up against fire and heat up to 1000 ℉(550 ℃).
LARGE SIZE - 15"x11" Enough space to store your legal document files, passport , cash, jewelry , photos, laptop and other valuables.
WATER RESISTANT - Not only does our bag stand up against fire, but it's also highly water resistant just in case it gets wet for any reason.
100% MONEY BACK - If you are not satisfied with our products for any reason, send it back for a 100% no questions asked refund.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,724 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
